channel.title: Change ip client help?
channel.description:
Hello, i want to create my own server, i found a nice base but i have trouble change the ip adresse on the client, hope you guys can help med out.
i'm useing this server / client as my base
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,553762.0.html

item.title: Change ip client help?
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

For the client, go in your client class and search for “127.0.0.1” and change accordingly.

Also the port being used is 43594.

Read full topic
